basisSet.dc:title: cc-pCVQZ(old)
basisSet.dct:abstract: QZ3P Quadruple Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Core/Valence Quadruple Zeta (cc-pCVQZ(old)) Basis ------------------------------------------------------------------------ Elements Contraction References Al - Ar: (19s,14p,6d,4f,2g) -> [9s,8p,6d,4f,2g] K.A. Peterson (unpublished)
These preliminary core/valence primitives were available from the EMSL web site from 7/24/97 to 1/13/03 and are provided for the sake of continuity. The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation.
